#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    int t,i,j;
    bool flag;
    string l,k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>l>>k;
        for(i=0;k[i];i++)
            if(l[i]!=k[i])
            break;
        if(!k[i])
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else
        {
            j=i+1;
            for(;k[i];i++,j++)
                if(l[j]!=k[i])
                break;
            if(!k[i])
                cout<<1<<endl;
            else
                cout<<0<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
